command.label: Toggle Ribbon / Classic
command.tooltip: Switch between Ribbon and Classic menu modes

command.label: Save As
command.tooltip: Save the active document under a new name

command.label: Pull
command.tooltip: Modify the shape by dragging faces

command.label: 3-Point / Tangent End
command.tooltip: Create a 3-point arc with tangent end option

command.label: Center and Ends
command.tooltip: Create an arc by center and two ends

command.label: Center and Point
command.tooltip: Create a circle by center and point

command.label: 3 Tangent
command.tooltip: Create a circle tangent to three entities

command.label: Axis and Ends Ellipse
command.tooltip: Create an ellipse by axis and ends

command.label: Center and Axis Ellipse
command.tooltip: Create an ellipse by center and axis

command.label: Join Curves
command.tooltip: Join curves into a single entity

command.label: Equal
command.tooltip: Apply equal length or equal radius constraint

command.label: Project
command.tooltip: Project edges or curves into sketch

command.label: Delete Segment
command.tooltip: Delete a segment of sketch geometry

command.label: Add Component
command.tooltip: Add existing parts to the assembly

command.label: New Component
command.tooltip: Create a new part in the assembly

command.label: Base Flange
command.tooltip: Create a base flange for a sheet metal part

command.label: Contour Flange
command.tooltip: Create flanges along a sketch contour

command.label: Lofted Flange
command.tooltip: Create lofted sheet metal flanges between profiles

command.label: Unbend
command.tooltip: Unbend bends to a flat state

command.label: Break Corner
command.tooltip: Chamfer or round sheet metal corners

command.label: Flat Pattern
command.tooltip: Generate a flat pattern of the sheet metal part

command.label: Export Flat
command.tooltip: Export flat pattern to DXF or similar formats

command.label: Distance
command.tooltip: Measure distance between points or entities

command.label: Mass Properties
command.tooltip: Compute mass, volume, and center of gravity

command.label: Mass Analysis
command.tooltip: Analyze mass and center of gravity

command.label: Rectangle Select
command.tooltip: Select objects with a rectangular window

command.label: Part Modeling
command.tooltip: Switch to the part modeling environment

command.label: Sheet Metal Design
command.tooltip: Switch to the sheet metal environment

command.label: Ship Design
command.tooltip: Switch to the ship design environment

command.label: Regenerate
command.tooltip: Regenerate the model to update all features

command.label: Merge/Inheritance
command.tooltip: Merge or inherit geometry from another model

command.label: Copy From
command.tooltip: Copy features or geometry from another model

command.label: Independent Geometry
command.tooltip: Create independent geometry from external references

command.label: Sketch
command.tooltip: Create a sketch on a selected plane or datum

command.label: Default Coordinate System
command.tooltip: Create or manage the default coordinate system

command.label: Extrude
command.tooltip: Create an extruded feature from sketches or curves

command.label: Revolve
command.tooltip: Create a revolved feature around an axis

command.label: Sweep
command.tooltip: Create a swept feature along a trajectory

command.label: Volume Helical Sweep
command.tooltip: Create a volume helical sweep feature

command.label: Shell
command.tooltip: Convert a solid body to a thin-walled shell

command.label: Auto Round
command.tooltip: Automatically apply rounds based on rules

command.label: Variable Pull Direction Draft
command.tooltip: Apply draft with variable pull direction

command.label: Pattern Table
command.tooltip: Create or edit a pattern table

command.label: Project
command.tooltip: Project curves or geometry onto surfaces

command.label: Wrap
command.tooltip: Wrap a sketch or curves onto a surface

command.label: Split Surface
command.tooltip: Split a surface using projected geometry

command.label: Thicken
command.tooltip: Thicken a surface into a solid

command.label: Solidify
command.tooltip: Solidify surfaces into solids or combine with solids

command.label: Vertex Round
command.tooltip: Round a vertex on a surface
